sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select $nf$ as nf , cast(substr(cast(yy.tjrq as char(8)),5,2) as integer) yf1,cast(substr(cast(yy.tjrq as char(8)),5,2) as char(3)) ||' 月份' yf , p.qjms, sum(yyjg) yyjg , count(khdxdh) rs ,case when count(khdxdh) = 0 then cast((cast(sum(coalesce(yyjg,0)) as decimal(19,2))/1) as decimal(19,2)) else cast((cast(sum(coalesce(yyjg,0)) as decimal(19,2))/cast(count(khdxdh) as decimal(19,2))) as decimal(19,2)) end pjgz from( select ym as tjrq,khdxdh,sum(yyjg) yyjg From khfa_yyjg_hy yy inner join ( select distinct ym from csb_sjw s where cast(substr(cast(s.tjrq as char(8)),1,4) as integer) =$nf$ ) t on yy.tjrq = t.ym where exists(select 1 from khfa_fapz pz where yy.fabh=pz.fabh and pz.yyzlbh=1) group by ym,khdxdh )yy inner join CSB_QJPZ p on p.QJMC='JXGZQJ' and yy.yyjg >= p.qjxx and yy.yyjg < p.qjsx and yy.tjrq between p.qsrq and p.jsrq group by tjrq,p.qjms union all select $nf$ as nf , cast(null as integer) yf,'月份合计' yf , p.qjms, sum(yyjg) yyjg , count(khdxdh)/count(distinct tjrq) rs ,case when count(khdxdh) = 0 then cast((cast(sum(coalesce(yyjg,0)) as decimal(19,2))/1) as decimal(19,2)) else cast((cast(sum(coalesce(yyjg,0)) as decimal(19,2))/cast(count(khdxdh) as decimal(19,2))) as decimal(19,2)) end pjgz from( select ym as tjrq,khdxdh,sum(yyjg) yyjg From khfa_yyjg_hy yy inner join ( select distinct ym from csb_sjw s where cast(substr(cast(s.tjrq as char(8)),1,4) as integer) =$nf$ ) t on yy.tjrq = t.ym where exists(select 1 from khfa_fapz pz where yy.fabh=pz.fabh and pz.yyzlbh=1) group by ym,khdxdh )yy inner join CSB_QJPZ p on p.QJMC='JXGZQJ' and yy.yyjg >= p.qjxx and yy.yyjg < p.qjsx and yy.tjrq between p.qsrq and p.jsrq group by p.qjms
